message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you in the middle just yet. I'm willing to compromise and offer you a price of $108. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105 again?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to make another compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to offer you a price of $107. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise again. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $106?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still trying to get the best deal. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to offer you a price of $109. What do you think?
